des: "A delicious halloween beverage for adults! Serve with a straw and plastic fangs over straw! I make this every year in a beverage server or punch bowl for my annual Halloween bash, and it always goes over good. Delicious and tastes somewhat like a sangria!"
ins: Fill a glass with ice cubes. Combine Cabernet Sauvignon wine, cranberry juice, and raspberry schnapps in a shaker. Shake cocktail well and pour over ice.
